mapper.select: /* selectEqpPerfCim */ SELECT ECHN.EQP_ID , SUBSTR(ECHN.CUR_TIME, 1, 8) CUR_DT , SUM(GQTY) CIM_QTY , 0 POP_QTY , MAX((SELECT EQP_DESC FROM EQP_MST WHERE PLANT_CODE = ECHN.SITE AND EQP_ID = ECHN.EQP_ID)) EQP_DESC FROM EQP_CNT_HIS_NOW@CIMORA ECHN WHERE 1 = 1 AND ECHN.SITE = #{SITE} AND ECHN.CUR_TIME > TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(#{START_DT} ,'YYYYMMDDHH24MI'), 'YYYYMMDD HH24MISSFF3') AND ECHN.CUR_TIME < TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(#{END_DT} ,'YYYYMMDDHH24MI'), 'YYYYMMDD HH24MISSFF3') GROUP BY SUBSTR(ECHN.CUR_TIME, 1, 8), ECHN.EQP_ID ORDER BY SUBSTR(ECHN.CUR_TIME, 1, 8), ECHN.EQP_ID
